requestBody.title: Create and publish offer version API Trace

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Access logging (who viewed what when)". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.

requestBody.title: Validate explicit UC need #5 API Trace

data.title: Validate explicit UC need #5 API Trace

data.instruction: Using credentials from another context, attempt to read or mutate booking/order resources for this biz.
data.expectedResult: Request is rejected with forbidden/unauthorized error and no data leakage.
